text: Thunder Among the Leaves () is a 1958 Argentine Paraguayan drama movie directed by Armando Bó (who also stars) and was based on the short story La hija del ministro by Augusto Roa Bastos. It also stars Isabel Sarli, Andrés Laszlo, Félix Ribero, Ernesto Báez, Javier Franco. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Paraguayan movies Category:Movies based on short stories
title: Thunder Among the Leaves
